txt.en: 'If the Orcs mean to settle here, they will have spears and axes with them for the hewing of Thinglad's old trees, and the slaughter of all its inhabitants.\n\n'You should destroy the weapons of the Orcs before they can be put to such cruel use. Be careful, [placeholder]...be sure that they do not cleave you first!'
'I am glad you made the effort to destroy the Orcs' means of harming Thinglad! They will not last here long...the power of LÃ³rien will prevail.'
'Be careful when you face the Orcs in the south. They have gathered their strength quickly.'
Renfaer has asked you to destroy the amassed weapons that Orcs use to harm forests.

Orc-weapons have been amassed in their large camp to the south of Thinglad.\n\nYou should destroy the weapon-stores of the Orcs before these tools can be used to harm the trees or creatures of the forest.
Renfaer is at his scouting location near the centre of Thinglad.\n\nYou should return to Renfaer.
